thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Bank Of Maharashtra Dec Qtr Loss Widens

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Bank Of Maharashtra Dec Qtr Loss Widens

organizations.name: bank of maharashtra dec qtr loss widens feb

text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Bank Of Maharashtra Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER NET LOSS 5.97 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS NET LOSS OF 1.83 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 27.24 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 29.22 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS 14.74 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 5.85 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER PROVISIONS FOR NON-PERFORMING ASSETS 13.44 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 5.32 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* DEC QUARTER GROSS NPA 19.05 PERCENT VERSUS 18.54 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* DEC QUARTER NET NPA 12.17 PERCENT VERSUS 12.68 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER Source text - bit.ly/2GS4Ytd Further company coverage:
